Package OMContract

Class Summary
Assertion An assertion checks all defined preconditions, postconditions and invariants, printing the error message if they fail.
Contract Contract is a small framework that supports the design by contract pattern.
Requirement A requirement checks all defined preconditions, postconditions and invariants, throwing exceptions if they fail.
 

Exception Summary
ContractException  
InvariantFailedException Is raised when a Invariant failed.
PostconditionFailedException Is raised when a Postcondition failed.
PreconditionFailedException Is raised when a precondition failed.
